name: Ric Thompson
what_you_do: Audible offers a wide range of audiobooks, podcasts, and Audible Originals, allowing users to listen to stories and content across various genres.
who_you_serve: Audible serves consumers looking for audio entertainment, including audiobooks and podcasts, primarily targeting B2C audiences.
bio: A subsidiary of Amazon, known for its extensive library of audiobooks and podcasts.
